title: Zyra needs to be nerfed.
body:
In comparison to every other support she is undeniably the #1 pick.

She has everything in her kit except for a heal (Which the new support items makes up for..)

Either buff other supports, nerf Zyra or increase the cost of her skills...

replies.body:
If not played correctly, she runs out of mana really quickly. She also has one of the lowest movements speeds in the game.

While she is good at zoning, she gets stomped pretty hard if you get up in her face (like leo/malph). 

The biggest zyra counterplay is taking notice of her seed placements, and to step on them as soon as it is safe. If she can't get her plants up, she isn't really that useful. 

She is like Lux and brand, one of the champions that do best in the midlane, but also do quite well as an AP support. Ofc they do way more damage than a nami/lulu, because that is how they hold their own as a solo laner. 

Easiest way to learn to counterplay a champion is to either use google, or actually play the champion. Get a feel for their cooldowns, powerspikes, item paths, combos, and a general feel for what they are trying to achieve at each point of the game (laning/roaming/teamfight).
